assessments.status_rationale: No report today confirmed USD/JPY touching 152.50; deadline is 2025-09-30, so the event window remains open.
Coverage notes the Houthis vowed revenge, but there are no verified claims of at least two attacks since 2025-08-31; window runs through 2025-09-30.
No evidence today that USD/MXN reached 18.50; the deadline is 2025-09-30.
News references the recent appellate ruling on Trump-era tariffs, but there is no indication CBP or the Federal Register has published implementation guidance yet; deadline 2025-09-30.
No Drewry WCI Shanghai–Rotterdam data was reported today; target date is on or before 2025-09-26.
The measurement window (2025-08-30 close to 2025-09-20 close) has just begun and U.S. markets are impacted by the Labor Day schedule; no outcome yet.
No explicit CME FedWatch probabilities were cited; with the deadline on 2025-09-17, this remains unresolved.
